#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	unsigned int t;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while(t--)
	{
		unsigned long n, no4=0;
		scanf("%ld", &n);
		int j = n/7;
		bool flag=false;
		for(; j>=0; j--)
		{
			int r = n - j*7;
			if( r%4==0 )
			{
				printf("%ld \n", j*7);
				flag = true;
				break;
			}
		}
		if( flag==false )
			printf("-1 \n");
		
	}
	return 0;
}
